title: Banks with large commercial real estate exposure may be shortsellers' targets, says RBI's Shaktikanta Das
description: Reserve Bank of India Governor Shaktikanta Das, speaking at the Bretton Woods Committeeâ€™s Future of Finance Forum in Singapore, expressed concerns about banks with significant commercial real estate exposure, noting that they could become targets for short sellers.
